name: First Horror Game Attempt Ever
description: **Content ends when tv turns on currently - coming back to this!** Short, buggy intro to a game idea I was working on. This was one of the first projects I ever tackled - and it shows. I was learning how to use unity and came up with this thing - and I'm sharing for anyone who wants to see how someone can go from knowing nothing, to becoming a game developer....whenever that happens that is.
